column2: From a cooler day: Exploring the BREATHTAKING Cape Perpetua and Cape Lookout Coastal Oregon (Video)
column5: Oregonâ€™s immense natural beauty and the wonders within never fail to amaze me and this was every bit the case when exploring the rocky shores and rainforest of Cape Perpetua and Cape Lookout in the central and northern Oregon coast. Hope the magnificence of this place brings a smile to your day (and may you stay cool in this sweltering heat wave).
